verses.text: In the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* began \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.\f + \fr 15.1 \ft Azariah: also called, Uzziah\f*

\w Sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* was he when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jecholiah|strong="H3203"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according to all that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*;

Save that the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not \w removed|strong="H5493"\w*: the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* still on the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5060"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, so that he was a \w leper|strong="H6879"\w* unto the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w several|strong="H2669"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

So \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ In the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w eighth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* did \w Zachariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

And \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him \w before|strong="H6905"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Zachariah|strong="H2148"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

This \add was\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add generation\add*. And so it came to pass.

¶ \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in the \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* and \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* a \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.\f + \fr 15.13 \ft Uzziah: Gr. Ozias\f*\f + \fr 15.13 \ft a full…: Heb. a month of days\f*

For \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gadi|strong="H1424"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, and his \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* which he \w made|strong="H7194"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Then \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Tiphsah|strong="H8607"\w*, and all that \add were\add* therein, and the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* thereof from \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*: because they \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* not \add to him\add*, therefore he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \add it; and\add* all the women therein that were with \w child|strong="H2030"\w* he ripped \w up|strong="H1234"\w*.

In the \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* and \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gadi|strong="H1424"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add and reigned\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not all his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* from the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

\add And\add* \w Pul|strong="H6322"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Pul|strong="H6322"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, that his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* might be with him to \w confirm|strong="H2388"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* \w exacted|strong="H3318"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* of all the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*, of \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*. So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* not there in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 15.20 \ft exacted: Heb. caused to come forth\f*

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and \w Pekahiah|strong="H6494"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ In the \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w Pekahiah|strong="H6494"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Menahem|strong="H4505"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \add and reigned\add* two \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

But \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*, a \w captain|strong="H7991"\w* of his, \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, in the \w palace|strong="H0759"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, with \w Argob|strong="H0709"\w* and \w Arieh|strong="H0745"\w*, and with him \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w Gileadites|strong="H1121"\w*: and he \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his room.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Pekahiah|strong="H6494"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ In the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \add and reigned\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

In the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Tiglath-pileser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ijon|strong="H5859"\w*, and \w Abel-beth-maachah|strong="H0062"\w*, and \w Janoah|strong="H3239"\w*, and \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*, and \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, and \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w Galilee|strong="H1551"\w*, all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and carried them \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* to \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

And \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* \w made|strong="H7194"\w* a \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* against \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead, in the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ In the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* began \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.

\w Five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* was he when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jerusha|strong="H3388"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ Howbeit the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not \w removed|strong="H5493"\w*: the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* and burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* still in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*. He \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w higher|strong="H5945"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w send|strong="H7971"\w* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*.

And \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
